title: Big boys don't cry
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Violence in mass media
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Violence
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Hunting - Moral and ethical aspects
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children and death
description: A young boy wanders through bushland enjoying nature's beauty. Carrying a slug gun he initially shoots at a paper cup, however images of TV western gunfights go through his mind and on impulse he takes aim and shoots a bird. Realising what he has done the boy runs away as scenes of real life violence flash before him - scenes of war and innocent killing. The boy makes the decision to return to target shooting. A non-verbal film with b&w sequences. Suitable for middle and upper primary and lower secondary levels.
